card-desc:
Here iz example of ur xp card. U can enter teh command `profile card <style>` 2 change the style
*Ur xp card will only refresh wehn u have won Xp*
changed-card: Ur xp card naw use the style %{style}
changed-error: Oops, a wicked error occurrd during the process ov ur request. Try again later or contact these nice support guys.
config_list:
List ov avaliable opt: %{options}

Use dat `help profile config` cmd 4 + details
invalid-card: Dat style iz no valid. But yop, her's styles u can use: %{cards}
list-cards: Her's da list of cards u can use: %{cards}
missing-attach-files: Oops, I'm missing the Attach Files perms :upside_down:
